section.title: Troubleshooting tips
section.para: In case you run into problems you can do the following

listitem.simpara: troubleshootingcheck documentationCheck the GRAM5 documentation. Maybe you'll find hints here to solve your problem.
troubleshootinggram logCheck the GRAM5 log for errors.
In case you don't find anything suspicious you can increase the log-level of GRAM5 or other relevant components. Maybe the additional logging-information will tell you what's going wrong.

troubleshootingmailing listsSend e-mails to gram-user@globus.org. You'll have to subscribe to a list before you can send an e-mail to it. See here for general e-mail lists and information on how to subscribe to a list and here for GRAM specific lists.
